title: 03/30/2021 - HOUR 1 - QBs, Jimmy G, Zion
itunes:title: 03/30/2021 - HOUR 1 - QBs, Jimmy G, Zion
description:
Colin discusses the great QBs that have been drafted over the last decade

Jimmy Garoppolo is close to his third strike with the Niners

Zion Williamson is showing why he will be the face of the league


Guest: Chris Broussard

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
